conversion_verification.notes: Successful conversion to an isometric-style cutaway render.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent dimensional transformation; walls, floors, and volume are clearly defined with a consistent viewing angle.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room layout is highly faithful. Minor wall angle distortion near the entrance hall but room adjacencies and proportions match well.

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture sets (living room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom) are present and correctly placed according to the floor plan.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean rendering with soft lighting. Geometry is readable. No UI text contamination.

detected_errors.description: The wall separating the hall and bathroom appears slightly skewed/non-perpendicular compared to the 2D plan.
Some window openings on the right-side wall are subtly inconsistent in width relative to the 2D drawing.

summary: The 3D render provides a highly accurate and clean geometric representation of the provided 2D floor plan with excellent furniture fidelity.
